Calculate fecundity or egg mass based on female size

Source: R/model_helpers.R
dot-calc_reprod_output.Rd

Internal function to compute fecundity and egg mass from female length using log-log allometric relationships.

Usage

.calc_reprod_output(size, allometry)

Arguments

size

Numeric. Female length in millimeters.

allometry

Named numeric vector of allometric parameters:

size_ref

Reference size.

fec_ref

Fecundity at reference size.

b_fec

Slope of log-log fecundity relationship.

egg_ref

Egg mass at reference size.

b_eggs

Slope of log-log egg mass relationship.

Value

Named list with:

fecundity

Numeric vector of fecundity (log-scale) for each size.

eggmass

Numeric vector of egg mass (log-scale) for each size.

Examples

allom <- c(size_ref = 500, fec_ref = 1000, b_fec = 3.0, egg_ref = 0.2, b_eggs = 1.0)
.calc_reprod_output(size = 550, allometry = allom)
#> Error in .calc_reprod_output(size = 550, allometry = allom): could not find function ".calc_reprod_output"
